locations.description: The entrance is made up to look like the wide gaping mouth of a sinister looking clown, but you'll be darned if you miss the one bit of n/excitement to come to your town in months
Through the entrance you come to an open area to your left is a fortune teller and to your right is the freak show.n/Too bad for you, right now you can only go back out the entrance
The Fortune Tellers looks up from her cards.n/'Hello! I've been waiting for you.
Through the entrance you come to an open area to your left is a fortune teller and to your right is the freak show. Too bad for you, right now you can only go back out the entrance
